Contact Us

Got a question about a football shirt or other items on the Dinoestadio store? Or perhaps you've got a question about your most recent order with us?

No problem, just drop us a line via the contact form below or use our live chat feature and we’ll get back to you ASAP.

Want to sell your shirt to us? Please send these to our dedicated email dinoestadiofootballshirts@gmail.com.

From Monday to Friday, we endeavour to respond to all messages before the end of the next working day. For messages received on a Friday and across the weekend, we aim to respond by the end of the next working day, unless that day is a public holiday. However, at busier times this may take a little longer.

Our Live Chat team operate on Monday to Friday between 9am to 5pm GMT+7. If you message outside of these hours we shall endeavour to reply to you as soon as possible via email.
